lists.name: Benefits of lumpectomy (+)
items: I want to preserve most of the natural breast shape and appearance.
I want to retain as much breast sensation as possible.
I may need less anesthesia and have a faster surgical recovery and fewer complications.
Survival from my cancer is the same as mastectomy, but the surgery is less to go through.

lists.name: Risks of lumpectomy (-)
items: I may need radiation therapy to treat my breast cancer.
I want to retain as much breast sensation as possible.
There is a very small chance that may need to return to the operating room if cancer cells are found in the edges (margins)..
I will need to continue breast imaging for screening

elements.other: Other benefits or risks for  yourself?
